note.p: Birth: West Maitland, New South Wales, Australia (17 March 1836)

Career: Assistant, Sydney Observatory (1859); Government Astronomer, New South Wales (1870-1905); President, Australasian Association for the Advancement of Science (1888); established meteorological stations; Vice-President, Board of Technical Education, New South Wales; Fellow of the Senate, University of Sydney.
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1907-1908 vol 80 pp lx-lxiii signed by F W D
